chart-desc: Adds the {{#chart:}} parser function for displaying charts
chart-error-data-source-page-not-found: Chart tabular data source page not found.
chart-error-incompatible-data-source: Tabular data source page is incompatible with charts.
chart-error-shell-disabled: Charts cannot be rendered because shell execution is disabled.
chart-error-shell-error: There was an error rendering the chart.
